original_text: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified.
korean_text: 너희가 그리스도의 이름으로 치욕을 당하면 복 있는 자로다 영광의 영 곧 하나님의 영이 너희 위에 계심이라

sentences.original_text: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ
for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you
sentences.korean_translation: 영광의 영과 하나님의 영이 너희 위에 머무르기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: on their part he is evil spoken of
but on your part he is glorified
